metadata.title: CVE-2021-45379 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Glewlwyd 2.0.0, fixed in 2.6.1 is affected by an incorrect access controlvulnerability. One user can attempt to log in as another user without itspassword.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glewlwyd - 2.7.1-1ubuntu1
glewlwyd-common - 2.7.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glewlwyd package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-1ubuntu1').
